ref.mixed-citation: Prokopy L, Arbuckle J, Barnes A, Haden VR, Hogan A, Jackson L, Lubell M, Niles M, Tyndall J (2013) Farmers and climate change: a cross-national comparison of beliefs and risk perceptions.
